Principal Duties and Responsibilities: Monitor, identify and resolve performance/behavior/attendance issues using prescribed performance management techniques. Monitor and take action on TKS, personnel and payroll issues. Conduct performance appraisals annually. Review Companiess compliance documents as required. Responsible for staffing and hiring. Resolve escalated customer issues. Hold team meetings on a regular basis with direct reports. Communicate all process and client changes to direct reports within specific timeliness Promote the use of all center communication tools. Responsible for day-to-day functional supervision of non-exempt work group, including work assignment and attendance monitoring; providing input into selecting, training, developing, and completing performance appraisal of work group(s) in accordance with the organizations policies and applicable legal requirements. Ability to establish a course of action for self and others to accomplish a specific goal while using appropriate resources. Ability to coach, develops action plans, which maximize performance and provide effective feedback. Proven ability to analyze and improve work processes and policies Excellent customer service / support skills, ability to work well under pressure, professional demeanor and strong written and oral communication skills. Must have proficiency with various software applications programs including Lotus Notes, Microsoft Word, and Excel. Startups love Unnati because we help them attract great talent and ensure that the founders can continue to focus on building a great product while we focus on finding them the right talent. Founded by a team of veteran entrepreneurs and passionate HR professionals, Unnati works with some of the most well known startup brands in India. Our list of clients include companies like: Zomato, Magic Bricks, Hector Beverages, Swiggy, Ziffi, Mettl, Zinka, Great Learning, Livspace, GoZoomo etc. We are an equal opportunity employer and are looking to hire smart, driven and committed individuals from my background. If you have always dreamed about making a career in the domain of HR, but didn't know how - then this is your opportunity. As a part of the team, you will get to work with some of the smartest entrepreneurs in the country and will learn valuable skills about identifying and recruiting great talent. You will get opportunity to manage clients independently and will learn to use all the latest technology tools in the HR domain. You will also get a chance to help us in the development of cutting edge technology that aims to remove the pain points from recruiting. As a Research Analyst Intern, your work will be to find information on the internet regarding various companies and create their pitch. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this RMS - PI 2016: Model Development Intern (Global Catastrophe Models) PI 2016: Model Development Intern (Global Catastrophe Models) Intern Location (India/ UK/ NJ/ CA) : The selected intern would work upon Global Catastrophe Models pioneered by RMS. The intern would get the opportunity to demonstrate his/ her analytical and engineering skills while contributing in developing exposures for earthquakes, hurricanes, and floods for different geographies across the globe. Particular skills in numerical/ statistical analysis, computing, databases etc. would add value. &; Study and learn frequent and probable sources of data from previous developments &; Visit and download data from required websites. If needed, carry out correspondence with relevant agencies asking for data. &; Note vintage and resolution of collected data and if possible maintain consistency. &; Format and prepare collected data for analysis. &; Fill the gaps found by collecting additional data. &; Perform regression analysis, interpolation, extrapolation, or projection of data as required. &; Prepare slides of the analysis results which may include but not limited to pie charts, bar charts, histograms, cluster plots, CDF, or PDF. &; Report and present analysis results to exposure modeler. &; Study and understand folder structures, directories, file locations and versioning. &; Prepare datasets, workbooks, databases and arrange for regular backup of data. &; Maintain research directory by source and vintage of collected information and data. &; Create a comprehensive and detailed backup for all the old projects with a write up. &; Prepare a write- upsupport file for description of the projects in the respective folder. The RMS Pinnacle Internship (PI) program will be held during the summer of 2016. The start date is June 6th and will run between 10- 12 weeks (depending on academic schedule) . Founded in 1989 as a spinoff of research done at Stanford University, today RMS is the world leader in catastrophe risk modeling. From earthquakes, hurricanes, and floods to terrorism, longevity, and infectious diseases, our models provide critical risk management solutions to financial institutions around the world. Based in our Silicon Valley headquarters and with offices throughout North America, Europe, and Asia, our team of more than 950 professionals may be larger than it used to be, but were still as ambitious and innovative as ever. Whether quantifying risks due to climate change, simulating how medical breakthroughs could extend life expectancy, delivering supercomputing in the cloud, or transforming an industry with our next generation technology platform, our passion is innovation driven by the courage to tackle problems others reject as unsolvable. RMS is proud to be an equal opportunity employer Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Banking / Financial Services / Broking Functional Area: Sales , Retail , Business Development Role Category:Retail Sales Role:Sales Executive/Officer Desired Candidate Profile Education- UG: Any Graduate PG:MBA/PGDM Doctorate:Any Doctorate - Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Risk Management Solutions, Inc. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this RMS - PI 2016: Model Development Intern (Data Modelling Exposure Analytics Project) PI 2016: Model Development Intern (Data Modelling Exposure Analytics Project) Intern Location (India/ UK/ NJ/ CA) : The intern would work on data modelling and exposure analytics projects and tools. The intern would get to learn and contribute to solutions for delivery, research, enhancement and quality assessment for exposure and other data required for re (insurance) loss modelling. The key skills required to be demonstrated during the internship would be numerical analysis, understanding of business logic, databases and basic data manipulation. &; Project based assignments: &; Understand the standard operating procedure and backend requirements for data quality assessment tools &; Assist in preparation of inputs files, datasets and tables for running of scripts for tool updates &; Assist in summarizing output files in the form of excel files or power point presentation and in comparing results with previous versions &; Create user manual and reference documents with details of input/ output requirements, paths and steps to make the process repeatable &; Ad- hoc running of data quality applications and report preparation Exposure data analysis, research and development: &; &; Develop an understanding of the proprietary RMS exposure database and other data assets &; Analyze gaps in the data and provide research and/ or analysis based recommendations on improvement &; Create reports with key insights on the database using different facts and dimensions &; Assist in developing logic to add more variables to the database &; Research competitors in the market providing similar products and share key difference/ similarities in the offering The RMS Pinnacle Internship (PI) program will be held during the summer of 2016. The start date is June 6th and will run between 10- 12 weeks (depending on academic schedule) . Backed by Oracle's world- class support organization, customers now have a single point of enterprise- class support for their entire virtualization environments, including Oracle Database, Fusion Middleware, Applications, and Linux, which are certified with Oracle VM. Oracle VM Templates deliver rapid software deployment and eliminate installation and configuration costs by providing pre- installed and pre- configured software images. Oracle is the only software vendor to combine the benefits of server clustering and server virtualization technologies, delivering integrated clustering, virtualization, storage, and management for grid computing. The Oracle Unbreakable Linux support program delivers enterprise- class support for Linux with premier back ports, comprehensive management, indemnification, testing and more, all at significantly lower cost. Both the Oracle Management Pack for Linux and Oracle Cluster ware are free for Oracle Unbreakable Linux support customers. Oracle Validated Configurations provide best practices for easier, faster, and lower- cost Linux deployment. The individual will also identify opportunities for Oracles Services and solutions at existing Enterprises where Oracle is currently in place, as well as opening the door within IT organizations at new customers in the territory. jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this Position Summary: The Development intern works with the Development team to help conduct prospect research, assist in writing proposals and supporting with the operational work.   Team Overview: The Development team is responsible for raising funds for the operations of Teach For India. Development is one of the critical backbones of the organizations as the organization is completely dependent on donations in its current form. The development team needs to be abreast with everything happening in the organization and the education sector as a lot of time is spent in creating and maintaining relationships with external stakeholders. The national team also provides tools and support to individual cities and the Expansion team in its fundraising efforts. The development team is divided into 9 work streams by different sources of funding that Teach For India receives. Some of these include Corporates, Foundations, Individual Giving, Retail Giving, Online, Events, among others. Responsibilities:  Primary responsibilities include: • Prospect research to gather more information about the prospect that helps drive meaningful conversations and estimate giving capacity • Leading research projects on various spheres connected to Development • Assisting Development Managers and Development Assistants with their development work • This is also an opportunity for the intern to gain valuable organizational exposure and experience and as such, the development team is happy to support the candidate’s specific areas of interest in work as far as we can Knowledge, Skills and Abilities: • Strong communication skills • Strong organizational skills • Willingness to learn • Comfort with constantly changing scenarios and a high stress environment • Strong time management and organizational skills Education and Experience Graduate/post graduate degree in any discipline Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: NGO / Social Services / Regulators / Industry Associations Functional Area: Teaching , Education , Training , Counselling Role Category:Other Role:Fresher Keyskills development operations tools maintaining events operational estimate team organizational skills intern Desired Candidate Profile Education- UG: Any Graduate PG:Post Graduation Not Required Doctorate:Any Doctorate - Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Teach For India At Teach For India, each one of us feels lucky. Incredibly lucky. We understand that it is just a matter of chance that we are where we are today. We didn't choose the family that we were born into, or choose the fact that our parents could afford to give us quality education. Every time we make a choice, we feel lucky. However, we cannot help but think …what if? What if these choices weren't available to us? It is this thought that makes us work towards that one day when every child in India will attain an excellent education. The family or the demographics that a child is born into should not determine his or her destiny. We understand the importance of education but more importantly, we understand the value of each of those 320 million lives and the potential in every one of them. Imagine 320 million astronauts, or 320 million scientists. Imagine 320 million change-makers driving India forward. That's what we're working towards - A day when every child gets the opportunity to attain an excellent education. A day when we can empower every human being with choice. Because that's what every child deserves. That's what India deserves. Download PPT Photo 1   View Contact Details

jobdescription: Job Description   Send me Jobs like this What is the company like? Endurance International Group is a leading provider of cloud- based solutions to SMBs worldwide. Listed on NASDAQ, Endurance manages more than 3 million customer relationships and owns the world's largest hosting companies such as Hostgator, BlueHost, Web- Presence - Directi, Ipage and more. In India, Endurance has a very strong presence through its brands Hostgator, BlueHost, BigRock, ResellerClub & Logicboxes. Through its strong performance & brand marketing activities, Endurance has been able to cement itself as an innovative family of brands that are market leaders within their categories. Endurance is now looking at expanding their footprint in the south east asia region and In early 2014, went through an M&A transaction to buy the web presence business of Directi, A leading internet products company based out of India. Location (s) : Bangalore/Mumbai What is the Job like? To help navigate our future growth, Endurance is looking for a Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist. In this role you will be responsible for hiring and on boarding top technical talent across technologies (Tech Areas: Big Data, Machine Learning, High Velocity Ad Serving using Languages such as Java, Scala, R on platforms including Hadoop, Redis, Spark and Storm) & position levels ranging from (Software Engineer to VP Software Engineering) . You would be required to hire technical talent from top tier companies in the internet, web presence and internet advertising space. While the list below is not exhaustive, it offers visibility into the various areas of responsibility. In this role, you will: Coordinate with respective functional heads to define recruitment requirements, job specifications, interview processes, prepare budgets and plans Define and implement creative sourcing strategies to source 'A' players from colleges, workplaces, databases Define and implement creative marketing strategies and campaigns to attract top talent from the industry. Define and implement sourcing, pitching and recruitment processes Manage recruitment lifecycle for various tech posts Ideate and create relevant material for marketing Directi and our businesses to potential candidates Build, mentor, and lead a team of A1 recruitment specialists Maximize ROI on recruitment costs and increase recruitment efficiencies. Who should apply for this post? You have worked in an Talent Acquisition / Recruitment role for at least 4- 5 years at a top- tier technology firm You (preferably) have a relevant post graduate degree (MBA/Masters in an HR discipline) You have exceptional communication skills - written and spoken Considerable experience with myriad sourcing strategies including portals, ads, consultants, social networking, conferences, headhunting etc Demonstrable creativity with respect to sourcing candidates Experience in sourcing, pitching and recruiting for mid management and sr management positions Well versed with technology and associated jargon. Ability to discuss technology to a limited extent as required by the profile. Ability to grasp and deliver an excellent pitch to potential candidates Keen sense of searching for and identifying exceptionally talented candidates Experience with using new age media such as social network, linkedin, blogs etc Experience in defining and implementing online marketing campaigns through social media, search marketing etc Process oriented: Demonstrable commitment to defining, documenting and following processes and workflows Excellent marketing and business development skills and acumen Bonus points: Avid Reader Active Blogger Tech background Well versed with Web 2.0 concepts and technologies Benefits & Perks Directians love their jobs, and not just because we offer the most competitive salaries in the industry. Our excellent benefits include everything from great medical and life insurance to catered meals. Our workspaces are comfortable and fun, complete with bean bag chairs, ping pong tables, and all the snacks you can eat. We have no dress code (tee- shirts are a- ok!) . We have flexible work hours and flexible holidays, which means that teams pick their own work hours. Directi has its own concierge desk that doubles up as a travel agency? We are passionate about building the next generation of web products, and we believe that happy directians are the key to achieving this goal. If you like the idea of working in an exciting workspace on cutting- edge internet products that make a truly global impact (and wearing flip- flops to work) , then we want to get to know you!
